page.title: 19SOUTH CHERITON GARAGE
page.content: South Cheriton Garage is owned by Mr. Franklin.He does mostly repairs as he does not have the facilities to carry out M.O.T.s. He has a franchise from Fords to deal in their cars and he does occasionally sell new vehicles. He probably repairs about 300 - 350 cars a year. He does not handle any agricultural machinery. He has a breakdown truck and will go out to tow vehicles in. He has two mechanics working for him and has no need for using the Youth Training Scheme. There has been a garage on this site for 33 years. Before that there was wasteland with some pigstyes. Mr. Franklin lives locally and has mainly regular established customers.His trade has steadily improved even during the recession.
